user.confirmed: Your account has been confirmed. Please, proceed with login.
user.expired: The link has expired. Please, request a new one from Login page.

text.email.verification.subject: Verification Email
text.email.title: Email verification.
text.email.paragraph: Dear user, please click below button to confirm you email:
text.email.copy: or copy this link and paste in you browser:

user.confirmed: Your account has been confirmed. Please, proceed with login.
user.expired: The link has expired. Please, request a new one from Login page.
user.notVerified: Your account has not been verified. A new link has been sent
user.verificationMessageSent: A verification message has been sent to your email. Please, check your email and click on the button 'Verify' or the link below it. After successful confirmation you can proceed with login on your mobile. Thank you.

text.email.verification.subject: דוא"ל אימות
text.email.title: אימות אימייל.
text.email.paragraph: משתמש יקר, לחץ על הלחצן הבא כדי לאשר לך דוא"ל:
text.email.copy: או להעתיק קישור זה ולהדביק בדפדפן שלך:

user.confirmed: Your account has been confirmed. Please, proceed with login.
user.expired: The link has expired. Please, request a new one from Login page.

text.email.verification.subject: بريد التحقق
text.email.title: تأكيد بواسطة البريد الالكتروني.
text.email.paragraph: عزيزي المستخدم ، يرجى النقر على الزر أدناه لتأكيد بريدك الإلكتروني:
text.email.copy: أو انسخ هذا الرابط والصقه في متصفحك:
